knimeNode.name: Value Counter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Counts the occurrences of values in a column

fullDescription.intro: This node counts the number of occurrences of all values in a selected column.
fullDescription.option: The column whose values should be counted

If want to enable hiliting between the distinct values in the output table and the corresponding rows in the input table, check this box. But be aware that this may require a lot of memory if the table is huge.

ports.outPort: One-column table with the different values as row keys and their occurrences as the only column.
